title: 8/17/21: Biden's Afghanistan Speech, MAGA Reactions, Vaccine Update, Newsom Recall, George W. Bush's Legacy, Lessons From Saigon, Afghanistan Papers, and More!

itunes:title: 8/17/21: Biden's Afghanistan Speech, MAGA Reactions, Vaccine Update, Newsom Recall, George W. Bush's Legacy, Lessons From Saigon, Afghanistan Papers, and More!

itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar analyze President Biden's Afghanistan withdrawal speech, how MAGA world is reacting, the covid vaccination updates, California's recall election, George W. Bush's legacy, lessons from Saigon, an untold history of the Afghanistan war, and more!
